description:
Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is the next-generation multi-format document-processing component suite for .NET developers. Currently, XtremeDocumentStudio .NET MVC Viewer extension supports viewing, printing, and converting PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, TIFF and MTIFF. More formats will be introduced in future. It can also convert document from one format to another, such as DOCX-to-PDF or PDF to images without requiring any other external software or libraries. It can also intelligently reconstruct page elements when converting PDF to DOCX. Some features such as programmatic document-creation, document-editing, and mail-merge have been introduced as a preview or beta.

		XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is 100% managed code. It can natively process supported formats without requiring external software such as Microsoft Word, Open XML SDK, Word Automation Services, Adobe PDF library or GhostScript.
releaseNotes:
Version 2016 R6 - October 19, 2016
==================================
Enhanced
~~~~~~~~
+ Multi-Format Document Viewer / Printer / Converter
  - [NEW] Excel Support [BETA]
    * Format Supported
      + XLSX
      + XLS
      + ODS
    * Features
      + Content
        - Text
        - Rich Text
        - Images
      + Formatting
        - Text Wrapping
        - RichText
        - Cell Formats
          * Number
          * Currency
          * Date
          * Time
          * Percentage
          * Special
        - Cell Merging
          * Horizontal
          * Vertical
      + Introduced “Formatter Settings” [to accept input to layout spreadsheet documents] under “Preferences” of DocumentViewer/Printer/Converter controls.
        - Page Settings
          * Margin
          * Size
          * Orientation
        - LayoutDirection 
          * ForwardZ
          * BackwardN
        - GridLinesView [boolean]
        - GridLinesPrint [boolean]
+ Document Engine
  - PDF
    * PDF object.
      + Deleting annotations supported.
    * PDFAnnot
      + Reading and setting modified date is enabled
    * PDFMarkupAnnot
      + Replying to existing annotation is supported.
      + Reading and setting intent type for annotation is supported.
    * PDFIntentType
      + Enumerations to set intent types are introduced.	  
Fixed
~~~~~
+ WinForms Document Viewer
  - Anchors causing problem in placing document pages in the viewer
+ Mail-Merge
  - Fields were not merging while specifying the custom map
+ Multi-Format Document Viewer / Printer / Converter
  - Issue with Tabs spacing in Word formats
  - DOC: Using Master Allocation table to construct FAT sector chain
+ Document Converter
  - Converting High resolution images
  - PDF to DOCX with only images, resulting DOCX was blank
  - DOCX to PDF with Unicode characters
  - DOCX to PDF with huge images with transparency
summary: View, print and convert PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, and single-page and multi-page TIFF. Provides MVC (both ASP and Razor) Document Viewer extension.
title: Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET MVC Viewer
